functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Arianok, \\n\\nI am so proud to tell you that beneath the altar of the caged chapel deep within this mountain, our Parish has finally achieved its longstanding goal.\\n\\nPraise be to the Goddess for illuminating my path to your bottled letter"}', '{"text":"amongst the rocky shore.\\n\\nAlthough it took time for me to write back initially, I am deeply thankful that I chose to do so.\\n\\nYou must be close indeed to our Lady!\\n\\nI cannot help but feel humbled by your"}', '{"text":"knowledge and generosity.\\n\\nTeiruun has never been like other Parishes.\\n\\nOur monks have always been far less pure or perfect than other ministers of Virtuo’s faith."}', '{"text":"But at last, the sin committed long ago by our founder can be rectified.\\n\\nNot only will our order again be led by a Virmari,\\n\\nbut for the first time since the Goddess’s departure, new Virmari shall walk Drehmal."}', '{"text":"Our order will be a beacon to the world, and Virtuo’s love will wash over every soul living on this continent.\\n\\nHumbly yours,\\n\\nAbbot Balthysar of Teiruun."}'],title:"Letter of Thanks",author:""}
